original_text: On the morrow, as they went on their journey, and drew nigh unto the city, Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour:
korean_text: 이튿날 그들이 길을 가다가 그 성에 가까이 갔을 그 때에 베드로가 기도하려고 지붕에 올라가니 그 시각은 제 육 시더라

sentences.original_text: as they went on their journey
and drew nigh unto the city
Peter went up upon the housetop
to pray about the sixth hour:
